name: Rooftop Rythm
description:
A 2D platformer where you have to avoid the pigeon spikes and snipers while dancing to the beat.

The goal is to get as many points as possible by jumping and dashing to the rhythm. You get a multiplier based on how close you clicked to the beat.

Controls

Left - A

Right - D

Dash - W,

R - Restart,

Left Click - Shoot
